items.description: Leading design for B2B SaaS products, managing a team of 3 designers, and establishing design systems that scale. Increased user engagement by 40% through thoughtful UX improvements.
Designed end-to-end experiences for mobile and web applications. Collaborated with engineering and product teams to ship features that improved conversion rates by 25%.
Created user interfaces for various client projects across fintech, e-commerce, and lifestyle brands. Conducted user research and usability testing to inform design decisions.
